author: rdonkin
msg: pom.xml is suitable for upload to repository.

author: gshimansky
msg: Applied VM side fix for HARMONY-5019
[jdktools][jpda] Agent has to ensure that all of its threads are terminated when Agent_OnUnload exits

author: gshimansky
msg: [jdktools][jpda] Improve cleanup procedure in JDWP agent
Now PacketDispatcher and EventDispatcher threads should be joined when VMDeath event
is received. The m_threadObject has to be saved in a global reference to make it
possible because it is not a local variable.
Also removed unneeded and non-standard libgcc_s dependency from agent and transport libraries.

author: xavier
msg: replace link from ivy+svn to ivy-svn
